thread.title: BRIEF-Grand Canyon Education Says HLC Approved its University's Application To Become A Non-Profit Institution

title: BRIEF-Grand Canyon Education Says HLC Approved its University's Application To Become A Non-Profit Institution

organizations.name: application to become a non-profit institution reuters

text: March 6, 2018 / 11:48 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Grand Canyon Education Says HLC Approved its University's Application To Become A Non-Profit Institution Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 6 (Reuters) - Grand Canyon Education Inc: * GRAND CANYON EDUCATION INC - HIGHER LEARNING COMMISSION APPROVED GRAND CANYON UNIVERSITYâ€™S APPLICATION TO BECOME A NON-PROFIT INSTITUTION * GRAND CANYON EDUCATION INC - AS PART OF TRANSITION, GCE WILL SELL CERTAIN ACADEMIC-RELATED ASSETS TO NON-PROFIT ENTITY * GRAND CANYON EDUCATION INC - FOLLOWING SALE, GCE WILL OPERATE AS THIRD-PARTY PROVIDER OF EDUCATIONAL, RELATED SERVICES TO GRAND CANYON UNIVERSITY Source text : ( bit.ly/2tjXNHJ ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
